ai-atk-s0403a24:2_1: In the first of the five kinds of conduct, that is to say, good conduct, bad bodily conduct, and good conduct, etc., as to dividing into bad bodily conduct, etc., as to receptacle, etc., as to division, and so on.
ai-atk-s0403a24:2_2: Ten things Deeds by way of doing good deeds,
ai-atk-s0403a24:2_3: Unskillful deeds in the true teaching and training.
ai-atk-s0403a24:4_0: for nine years old, filthy, stinking, filthy, and disgusting.
ai-atk-s0403a24:6_1: Ten persons: in the Ten Protector of an individual essence,
ai-atk-s0403a24:6_2: if he sits down on the seat after the last seat, sits down on the last seat in the dining hall;
ai-atk-s0403a24:7_0: The fifth sub-chapter on bad conduct is finished.
